name: Eigenlayer
description: EigenLayer lets Ethereum users restake assets to support other protocols and earn extra rewards.

name: Etherfi
description: EtherFi is a liquid restaking on Ethereum. Stake ETH to get eETH to reward you more across DeFi.

name: 1inch
description: The 1inch Network unites decentralized protocols whose synergy enables the most lucrative, fastest and protected operations in the DeFi space.

name: Aave
description: Aave is a decentralized finance money market protocol that allows you to lend, borrow, and earn interest on cryptocurrencies.

name: Uniswap
description: Uniswap V3 is a noncustodial automated market maker implemented for the Ethereum Virtual Machine. It provides increased capital efficiency, fine-tuned control of liquidity provider, and improve accuracy and convenience of its price oracle.
